FuncDef:
The hwtacacs-server service-name command configures an HWTACACS service name.
The hwtacacs-server service-name command cancels an HWTACACS service name.
By default, no HWTACACS service name is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an HWTACACS service name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On an HWTACACS server, a user name can be allocated different rights based on different service names. After the hwtacacs-server service-name command is run, a user logging in to the device is allocated a right based on the configured HWTACACS service name.
